mapper.insert: insert into db_qtsku (QTSKU, REFSKU, 'NAME', 'STANDARD', SORT, UNIT, NETWEIGHT, GW, 'LENGTH', WIDTH, HEIGHT, CUSTOMNAMECN, CUSTOMNAMEEN, CUSTOMHSCODE, ORIGIN, CURRENCY, UNITPRICE, UPDATETIME, WAREHOUSEID, WAREHOUSENAME, SKUSTOCK, AVAILABLESTOCK, ERRFLAG, ERRDESC, USERID) values (#{qtsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customnamecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customnameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customhscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skustock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{availablestock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{errflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_qtsku set REFSKU = #{refsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STANDARD' = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NETWEIGHT = #{netweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GW = #{gw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'LENGTH' = #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WIDTH = #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUSTOMNAMECN = #{customnamecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMNAMEEN = #{customnameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMHSCODE = #{customhscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNITPRICE = #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WAREHOUSEID = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSENAME = #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUSTOCK = #{skustock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVAILABLESTOCK = #{availablestock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERRFLAG = #{errflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERRDESC = #{errdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QTSKU = #{qtsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select QTSKU, REFSKU, 'NAME', 'STANDARD', SORT, UNIT, NETWEIGHT, GW, 'LENGTH', WIDTH, HEIGHT, CUSTOMNAMECN, CUSTOMNAMEEN, CUSTOMHSCODE, ORIGIN, CURRENCY, UNITPRICE, UPDATETIME, WAREHOUSEID, WAREHOUSENAME, SKUSTOCK, AVAILABLESTOCK, ERRFLAG, ERRDESC, USERID from db_qtsku where QTSKU = #{qtsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select QTSKU, REFSKU, 'NAME', 'STANDARD', SORT, UNIT, NETWEIGHT, GW, 'LENGTH', WIDTH, HEIGHT, CUSTOMNAMECN, CUSTOMNAMEEN, CUSTOMHSCODE, ORIGIN, CURRENCY, UNITPRICE, UPDATETIME, WAREHOUSEID, WAREHOUSENAME, SKUSTOCK, AVAILABLESTOCK, ERRFLAG, ERRDESC, USERID from db_qtsku
